creator: Monkey Taps
descriptionHtml:
Knowledge is power. Learn interesting things every day and surprise everyone with Daily Random Facts! Get notifications to learn entertaining and interesting facts.


Want everyone to think you’re super smart? Amaze others with your unique knowledge of facts and stand out from the crowd. Or just try to learn something interesting everyday. You will have loads of fun with Daily Random Facts so try it out today for free!


Explore thousands of facts and interesting content, sorted in categories like:

- Human body facts

- History dates

- Facts about animals

- Life hacks

- Facts for kids

- Facts about sports

- Trivia questions and answers

- Science facts

- Riddles

... And many more!


And now with Facts Premium you can:

+ Remove Ads

+ Save your Favorite Facts

+ Change Font and Colors

+ Search Facts by Word

+ Browse Facts curated in Categories

descriptionHtml:
Knowledge is power. Learn interesting things every day and surprise everyone with Daily Random Facts! Get notifications to learn entertaining and interesting facts.


Want everyone to think you’re super smart? Amaze others with your unique knowledge of facts and stand out from the crowd. Or just try to learn something interesting everyday. You will have loads of fun with Daily Random Facts so try it out today for free!


Explore thousands of facts and interesting content, sorted in categories like:

- Human body facts

- History dates

- Facts about animals

- Life hacks

- Facts for kids

- Facts about sports

- Trivia questions and answers

- Science facts

- Riddles

... And many more!


And now with Facts Premium you can:

+ Remove Ads

+ Save your Favorite Facts

+ Change Font and Colors

+ Search Facts by Word

+ Browse Facts curated in Categories

*Compatible with WearOS: you can use it in your watch.
descriptionShort: Knowledge is power: Learn daily interesting facts.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This time we've got tons of news we'd like you to enjoy, we've worked hard on them:

- Now you can listen to an audio track on our animated themes, making the experience more enjoyable.
- Not only that, you can also use Animated Themes within your random favourite themes.
- Change your name so we can customize quotes for you.
- You reading quotes from widgets? Now you can add them to your favourite list from there!
Love the app? Tell us in the reviews section! We read it all. Have a happy day!

Want everyone to think you’re super smart? Amaze others with your unique knowledge of facts and stand out from the crowd. Or just try to learn something interesting everyday. You will have loads of fun with Daily Random Facts so try it out today for free!


Explore thousands of facts and interesting content, sorted in categories like:

- Human body facts

- History dates

- Facts about animals

- Life hacks

- Facts for kids

- Facts about sports

- Trivia questions and answers

- Science facts

- Riddles

... And many more!


And now with Facts Premium you can:

+ Remove Ads

+ Save your Favorite Facts

+ Change Font and Colors

+ Search Facts by Word

+ Browse Facts curated in Categories

*Compatible with WearOS: you can use it in your watch.
descriptionShort: Knowledge is power: Learn daily interesting facts.

title: Daily Random Facts

creator: Monkey Taps LLC
descriptionHtml:
Knowledge is not only power.

Knowledge means living a more interesting, colorful life in a diverse, amazing world full of wonders. Knowledge means looking deeper, seeing clearer, and discovering how incredibly unique our world is.

And you are a part of it. Be a part of it! Use the app Daily Random Facts to learn thousands of fascinating facts and discover how truly astonishing the world around you is. Amaze others with your knowledge, discover different perspectives to experience life, and become an incredibly captivating interlocutor by sharing interesting facts with family, friends, and colleagues.

Download the app, choose your favorite categories, and discover the curiosities about the world around you. Using notifications and other useful tools of the app you can learn thousands of facts about:

- Human body
- History dates
- Facts about animals
- Life hacks
- Facts for kids
- Facts about sports
- Trivia questions and answers
- Science facts
- Riddles

... And many more!

And there is something else Daily Random Facts offers you: a choice!

There are two different grades of access to a lot of amazing and useful features the app has to offer. All you need to do is to choose the option that works best for you.

Having full access to the app allows you:

- Configure the app the way you like it by changing font, color, and background.
- Browse for facts within the app.
- Save the most interesting facts and organize them into categories.
- Remove ads to fully concentrate on learning.
- Compatible with WearOS: You can use the app on both your phone and your watch.
descriptionShort: Knowledge is power: Learn daily interesting facts.

And you are a part of it. Be a part of it! Use the app Daily Random Facts to learn thousands of fascinating facts and discover how truly astonishing the world around you is. Amaze others with your knowledge, discover different perspectives to experience life, and become an incredibly captivating interlocutor by sharing interesting facts with family, friends, and colleagues.

Download the app, choose your favorite categories, and discover the curiosities about the world around you. Using notifications and other useful tools of the app you can learn thousands of facts about:

- Human body
- History dates
- Facts about animals
- Life hacks
- Facts for kids
- Facts about sports
- Trivia questions and answers
- Science facts
- Riddles

... And many more!

And there is something else Daily Random Facts offers you: a choice!

There are two different grades of access to a lot of amazing and useful features the app has to offer. All you need to do is to choose the option that works best for you.

*It supports Wear OS: you can use it in your watch.

Having full access to the app allows you:

- Configure the app the way you like it by changing font, color, and background.
- Browse for facts within the app.
- Save the most interesting facts and organize them into categories.
- Remove ads to fully concentrate on learning.
descriptionShort: Knowledge is power: Learn daily interesting facts.

Use the Daily Random Facts app to learn thousands of fascinating facts and discover how truly astonishing the world around you is. Amaze others with your knowledge, discover different perspectives to experience life, and become an incredibly captivating interlocutor by sharing interesting facts with family, friends, and colleagues.

Download the app, choose your favorite categories, and discover the curiosities about the world around you. Using the app’s notifications and other useful features, you can learn thousands of facts about:

- Human body
- History dates
- Facts about animals
- Life hacks
- Facts for kids
- Facts about sports
- Trivia questions and answers
- Science facts
- Riddles
- And much more!

And there’s something else Daily Random Facts offers you: a choice! There are two different levels of access to the amazing and useful features the app has to offer. All you need to do is to choose the option that works best for you.

Having full access to the app allows you to:

- Configure the app the way you like it by changing font, color, and background.
- Browse for facts within the app.
- Save the most interesting facts and organize them into collections.
- Remove ads to fully concentrate on learning.

*It works on Wear OS: you can use it on your watch.
